item.title: Converting markdown files to HTML5 in RStudio
item.description: HTML5 slides I recently learned how to create HTML5 slides using .Rmd files and pandoc. Click here to check out an example. I will be posting a tutorial on how to do this in the near future (I hope). Update Here is a much cooler example I found on magesâ€™ blog Update 2 This process has been streamlined in the newest update to RStudio (check it out here). The results are quite impressive (Ex.
